headline: PNC Stock Sheds 10% After Digital Expansion News: Is There Value in 2025?
summary: If you’re weighing your options with PNC Financial Services Group, you are definitely not alone. Investors have been eyeing this stock for signals about whether it’s time to jump in or hang back, especially after a stretch of mixed price action. Over the past year, PNC has eked out a 0.9% gain, while the 5-year return stands at a robust 83.4%. But take a closer look and you’ll notice some turbulence: the stock slipped 10.1% over the past month, even as it recovered slightly this week. This...
